title.rendered: How the Traditional Model is Broken and What To Do Instead with Anthony Lee of Canopy Management

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 37:32 — 34.4MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 37:32 — 34.4MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Anthony Lee, is the Amazon subject matter expert at Canopy Management, Anti Guru, Thought-provoking leader. He will talk about why the business models we think we’re operating on Amazon aren’t the ones that drive success and what to do about it.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • What a good product depends on
  • That the real issue is that “luck” is not accounted for
  • The different approaches to mitigate the potential for loss 
  • That testing is also as important as research
  • How important it is to stay lean
